channel.title: Ramah: Good News Feed
channel.description: Positive news stories from around the world, filtered by sentiment analysis

item.title: Citizen scientists discover a Great Barrier Reef coral giant ‘like a rolling meadow’
item.description: Citizen scientists have discovered what they believe is one of the largest coral colonies ever documented on the Great Barrier Reef.

item.title: Google apologises for Baftas alert to 'see more' on racial slur
item.description: Google has apologised for sending a news alert on this year's Bafta awards ceremony that suggested suggesting people read further into a racial slur.

item.title: Live: Taylor pleased PM 'safe and well' after evacuation from The Lodge over security threat
item.description: Prime Minister Anthony Albanese was evacuated from The Lodge while police searched his residence in Canberra following a security threat.

item.description: Last year, 275 refugees, predominantly from Africa, settled in Armidale.

item.description: Take a squiz at the ABC's New Quiz topic page and see if you're a whiz at our previous quizzes.

item.title: Down with Love: Ewan McGregor and Renée Zellweger’s perfectly offbeat 60s fantasy
item.description: In May 2003, a romcom starring Renée Zellweger and Ewan McGregor seemed like a surefire recipe for success.

item.title: Pauline Hanson’s populism is a front. But there are lessons for progressives in One Nation’s surging popularity | Peter Lewis
item.description: With its vote surging, One Nation is throwing down the gauntlet to the entire Australian political system, not just to the Coalition but to super-progressives as well.

item.description: We hear from a range of voices on the impact of the government's SEND reforms in England.

item.description: Hong Kong has formally complained to the government of Panama after it took control of two ports on the Panama Canal.

item.title: WIN Network buys Nine Darwin, expanding operations to the NT
item.description: The WIN Network has acquired Nine Darwin under a five-year agreement, a year after Nine scrapped its local Northern Territory TV news bulletin.

item.title: Rugby league should celebrate and build on the World Club Challenge
item.description: Lifelong memories are not usually made during dank winter nights at the MKM Stadium in Hull, but the World Club Challenge will be treasured even by those of us who do not have red and white allegiances.

item.title: FBI director invites fresh scrutiny over travels with appearance at US men's hockey team celebration
item.description: WASHINGTON — When the American men's hockey team retreated to their locker room to celebrate their Winter Olympics gold medal win, they were joined by a special guest from the United States: FBI Director Kash Patel.

item.title: Sunshine Coast live-music venue Solbar to shut down after more than 20 years
item.description: The Sunshine Coast's longest-running live music venue Solbar has announced it will permanently close after this weekend.

item.title: Pentagon buyer: We're happy with our launch industry, but payloads are lagging
